item.description:
One of our members, Tracey, works for a nonprofit organization (Keystone Human Services, Inc.) which serves people who have intellectual disabilities. They are selling tickets to the Travelers Championship PGA Tour Golf Turnament as a fundraiser. The tickets are normally $39 at the gate and $29 online. Tracey and her organization are selling them for $20 with the nonprofit organization getting to keep $10.

The event runs from June 18-24 and there is a concert series on 6/20 (Javier Colon form last year's the Voice) and 6/23 KC & The Sunshine Band.

If any of our members or guests are interested in tickets please let Tracy know by the link below to her profile and using the e-mail link there to send her your interest. Please note that you must be logged into Meetup to be able to send her e-mail.

6/18

* 9:00 AM Opening Ceremony

6/19

* 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM Farmington Bank Fan & Family Day - free golf activities
* 5:00 PM Golf Digest Junior Pro-Am - youth get to play 9 holes along PGA Tour pros

6/20

* 6:50 AM - 8:50 AM, 12:00 PM - 2:00 PM Celebrity Pro-Am
* (after play) Javier Colon Concert

6/21

* 7:00 AM - 9:00 AM, 12:00 PM - 2:00 PM First Round

6/22

* 7:00 AM - 9:00 AM, 12:00 PM - 2:00 PM Second Round
* (after play) KC and The Sunshine Band Concert

6/23

* 8:00 AM - 2:00 PM Third Round

6/24

* 8:00 AM - 2:00 PM Final Round
* 6:00 PM Closing Ceremony

 

Tracy (our member making this offer)
http://www.meetup.com/Hartford-Area-Hiking/members/3070319/

Travelers Championship PGA Tour Golf Turnament
http://www.travelerschampionship.com/

Keystone Human Services, Inc. (the nonprofit benifiting by this fundraiser)
http://www.keystonehumanservices.org/key-human-services/
item.how_to_find_us: You are on your own for this event for whatever day(s) you choose to come.

group.name: The Hartford Area Hiking™ Meetup Group

item.name: Fund Raiser - Travelers Championship PGA Tour Golf Turnament
